mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CM08M01 ( FILE_KEY, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TRGT_TYP, FILE_TRGT_KEY, USE_YN, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM ) VALUES( TB_CM08M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileTrgtTyp}, #{fileTrgtKey}, 'Y', #{userId}, 'admin', SYSDATE )
